name: StockTrumps
tagline: Real-time multiplayer top trumps comparing stocks for great good
body:
# StockTrumps
## Unfortunately this site is no longer live. Sorry! :(
Check out our slides [here](https://github.com/daphack/hacktheburgh15/blob/master/slides/StockTrumps.odp?raw=true) for a summary of the project, or see our [ChallengePost](http://challengepost.com/software/stocktrumps) entry.

Here's a screenshot for extra awesome:
![Screenshot of a game in progress](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daphack/hacktheburgh15/master/screenshots/play.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
